#summary help teachers to collect questions from students in classroom
#labels Featured,hotquestion

= Introduction =

The first moodle activity for physical classroom. The idea comes from Purdue University's [http://www.itap.purdue.edu/tlt/hotseat/ hotseat].  

In classroom, students post questions into Hot Question activity from notebook, netbook, android, iPhone, iPod Touch and other gears which can access the moodle site. Students can also vote on others' questions, so that the hottest questions will be popped up. Teachers can check and make orally comments on selected questions before the end of the class.

= Installation & Usage =

 # Download hotquestion-x.x.tar.gz from [http://code.google.com/p/sunner-projects/downloads/list]. 
 # Untar and put hotquestion/ into mod/ 
 # Login moodle as admin and access http://you.site.root/admin/ to install
 # Add this activity into your course page like other activities
